function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"High mortality rates, strain on healthcare systems, economic impact","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and promoting hygiene practices","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, and rapid testing technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Misinformation and conspiracy theories about the pandemic","Impact":"Undermining public trust, noncompliance with public health measures, increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Promoting accurate information, debunking myths, and increasing media literacy","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, and educational campaigns","People":"General population, social media users, conspiracy theorists","Owner":"Public health agencies, media organizations, tech companies"},{"Description":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","Impact":"Uncoordinated responses, ineffective containment strategies, increased global spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Establishing global health agreements, sharing data and resources, and coordinating cross-border responses","Technologies":"Global health information systems, data sharing platforms, and telemedicine technologies","People":"World leaders, international organizations, healthcare professionals","Owner":"International health agencies, world governments"}]}
